original_title: 耳舐め囁き洗脳された巨乳レズビアンが彼女の前で寝取られ堕ちた日。
overview: Three people who were friends. Mitsuki was secretly in love with Nanami, but without being able to tell her how she felt, the two ended up in a romantic relationship. One day, due to her loneliness, Mitsuki decided to write her current troubles on her love consultation bulletin board. When she does, she is recommended to do something called "event art"...? A playful event technique... Gradually losing the brakes, the desire to change the relationship between the two... Melting Ear Licking Brainwashing Lesbians!
title: That Day, This Big Tits Lesbian Received Sweet Ear Licking And Whispering That Seduced Her Into Getting Fucked In Front Of Her Girlfriend
